page.title: 14GAMEKEEPING
page.content: Mr.McHutcheon the gamekeeper of Dunecht estate,breeds game birds.The main part of his job is breeding {French partridges.}The first stage in the proceed of hatching the eggs is to put them in an incubator for 21 days then the eggs are put in a hatching machine for a further 3 days.The hatching machine has to be kept closed for the full 3 days and the humidity has to be kept high otherwise the inside of the eggs will go like leather and the chicks will not be able to peck their way out and they will die. French partridges are the main birds reared from eggs as there is a much higher recovery rate.10,000 eggs are put into incubation and it is hoped that at least 7000 eggs will hatch and survive.
